sentence.text: Though epidermis development has been identified to be the causal gene of DDD, the heterogeneity of this disease was displayed: for example, protein O-linked glycosylation and protein O-linked glycosylation were recently identified and confirmed to be additional pathogenic genes of DDD.
No other novel mutation or this deletion was detected in protein O-linked glycosylation in a second DDD family and a sporadic DDD case by Sanger Sequencing.
